text: Kazuyo Matsukawa (松川一代, born 7 January 1970) is a Japanese volleyball player. She was part of the Japan women's national volleyball team. She competed at the 1990 Asian Games winning a bronze medal, 1994 Asian Games, and 1994 Goodwill Games. On club level she played with Orange Attackers. == References == == Other websites == * The 12th Asian Games (1994/Hiroshima) Volleyball WOMENS Final Round League KISHIMOTO CORPORATION Category:1970 births Category:Japanese volleyball players Category:Living people
title: Karuyo Matsukawa
